alternativeNames: Nilsson-Degelius, Gunnar Bror Fritiof; Nilsson, Gunnar Bror Fritiof
examples: Pseudocyphellaria lacerata Degel. in Göteborgs Kungl. Vetensk. Samhälles Handl., Ser. B, Math. Naturvensk. Skr. 1(no. 7): 20 (1941)
notes: né Nilsson, G.B.F., name changed to Nilsson-Degelius, G.B.F. in 1932 then Degelius, G.B.F. in 1933
source: CMI, Missouri Bryological list. Date of death from Bull. Nation. Sci. Mus.,  Tokyo, Ser. B, 24(1): 17 (1998).
